itemDescription: United States Army Medal of Honor recipient

wikipedia_page.main: James Jardine (April 16, 1837 – December 9, 1922) was a Union Army soldier during the American Civil War. He received the Medal of Honor for gallantry during the Siege of Vicksburg on May 22, 1863.

response: * Sergeant James Jardine, Company F - Medal of Honor  — Participating in the same "forlorn hope."
* James Jardine (engineer) (1776–1858), Scottish civil engineer, mathematician and geologist
* James Jardine (Medal of Honor) (1837–1922), Union Army soldier and Medal of Honor recipient
